integration_patterns: Queue-based asynchronous processing on AWS SQS

evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services for cloud storage and processing needs.
Health insurance transactions comply with HIPAA and leverage X12 standards.
API documentation mentions support for FHIR for healthcare interoperability.
The use of Azure services is documented for processing claims efficiently.
Integration patterns include usage of REST APIs and asynchronous queuing using AWS.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on their site.
